author: Jim Meehan
description: A boozy aperitivo that's reminiscent of a bone dry Manhattan with underlying gentian bitterness.
name: Brown Bomber
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)
15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
